title: Geraldo vs Hannity, Grinch > Cops 12.16.21
itunes:title: Geraldo vs Hannity, Grinch > Cops 12.16.21
description:
In episode 1052, Miles and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by podcaster and comedian Jon Grabus to discuss All those texts from Fox hosts on Jan 6 IS JUST A MEDIA SMEAR, Cops Need to Leave The Grinch the Fuck Alone and more!

  1. All those texts from Fox hosts on Jan 6 IS JUST A MEDIA SMEAR
  2. Geraldo Keeps It Real With Hannity
  3. Cops Need to Leave The Grinch the Fuck Alone
  4. VIDEO: Hewitt PD arrests Grinch at city's Christmas Tree Lighting
  5. Cops Continue To Misunderstand the Entire Point of How the Grinch Stole Christmas
  6. Deputies arrest ‘Grinch’ who stole a vehicle in Highlands Ranch


LISTEN: Ninjarous (feat. MF Doom) by Danger Mouse & Sparklehorse

Listen: The Movie Buff

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
